deluge.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a large amount of something such as letters or questions that someone gets at the same time
deluge.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Viewers sent a deluge of complaints about the show.
deluge.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a large flood, or period when there is a lot of rain
deluge.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to send a very large number of letters, questions etc to someone all at the same time
deluge.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He was deluged with phone calls from friends and colleagues, congratulating him.
deluge.translation[1].definitions[0].not: Deluge is usually passive in this meaning
deluge.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to cover something with a lot of water
